Gerrie & Louise bụ ihe nkiri Canada nke 1997 nke Sturla Gunnarsson duziri. bụ  Ihe nkiri a na-enyocha South Africa post-apartheid site na oghere Gerrie Hugo, onye bụbu onye ọrụ na South Africa Defence Force bụ onye hụrụ n'anya ma lụọ Louise Flanagan, onye nta akụkọ na-enyocha ọrụ SADF na ihe omume esemokwu dị iche iche n'oge oge apartheid..
Ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara n'afọ 1997 Toronto International Film Festival, mana e kesara ya dịka mgbasa ozi CBC Television.
